attributes.action: Extend the transition period of Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Because public is not ready for no deal brexit. we should give more time to negotiators to find better deal for uk.
attributes.background: I want government to extend the brexit transition period

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government cannot unilaterally extend the transition period, which would be a joint decision for the UK Government and EU.

You might like to sign and share this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500
